author: Adil M. Bagirov and Alex Rubinov and A. N. Soukhojak and John Yearwood
title: Unsupervised and supervised data classification via nonsmooth and global optimization
venue: School of Information Technology and Mathematical Sciences, The University of Ballarat
window: some databases with known classes. We used the diabetes, liver disorder, heart disease, breast cancer, vehicles, synthetic, penbased recognition of handwritten digits (PBRHD) and image segmentation datasets in numerical experiments.
